Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Drug or Chemical by Structure/Organic Chemical/Lactone Compound/Macrolide/Epothilone Compound/Epothilone B Analogue,/NCIThesaurus/Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Antineoplastic Agent/Antimitotic Agent/Tubulin Binding Agent/Taxane-Pocket Binding Agent/Epothilone B Analogue
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: Analogues of epothilone B exhibiting antineoplastic activity. Epothilone B analogues bind to tubulin and promote tubulin polymerization and microtubule stabilization, thereby inhibiting mitosis. (NCI)
